attributes.action: Bring back corporal punishment to the U.K. and HANGING for MURDER
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We need to remove the people from this planet who think that they can go out on the streets of the United Kingdom and murder and maim people just to further their own ends, i.e. for cash for drugs and other related reasons.
I am not a religeous person but I believe the BIBLE states ThAT YOU DO UNTO OTHERS AS THEY WOULD DO UNTO YOU.
This country needs a Referendum on the above

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
